verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: If a soul sin, and commit a trespass against the Lord, and lie unto his neighbour in that which was delivered him to keep, or in fellowship, or in a thing taken away by violence, or hath deceived his neighbour;
verses.verse_html:
2If a soul sin, and commit a trespass against the Lord, and lie unto his neighbour in that which was delivered him to keep, or in fellowship, or in a thing taken away by violence, or hath deceived his neighbour; ▼
▼ in fellowship: or, in dealing
 , ▼
▼ fellowship: Heb. putting of the hand

tokens.text: him to keep, or in fellowship
or in a thing taken away by violence

footnotes.body_html: ▼ in fellowship: or, in dealing

footnotes.body_text: ▼ fellowship: Heb. putting of the hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ fellowship: Heb. putting of the hand

verses.text_plain: Or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, sinning therein:
verses.verse_html: 3Or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, sinning therein:

tokens.text: of all these that a man

verses.text_plain: Then it shall be, because he hath sinned, and is guilty, that he shall restore that which he took violently away, or the thing which he hath deceitfully gotten, or that which was delivered him to keep, or the lost thing which he found,
verses.verse_html: 4Then it shall be, because he hath sinned, and is guilty, that he shall restore that which he took violently away, or the thing which he hath deceitfully gotten, or that which was delivered him to keep, or the lost thing which he found,

tokens.text: Then it shall be, because he hath sinned

verses.text_plain: Or all that about which he hath sworn falsely; he shall even restore it in the principal, and shall add the fifth part more thereto, and give it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day of his trespass offering.
verses.verse_html:
5Or all that about which he hath sworn falsely; he shall even restore it in the principal, and shall add the fifth part more thereto, and give it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day of his trespass offering. ▼
▼ in the day…: or, in the day of his being found guilty: Heb. in the day of his trespass

tokens.text: Or all that about which he hath sworn
it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in the day…: or, in the day of his being found guilty: Heb. in the day of his trespass
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in the day…: or, in the day of his being found guilty: Heb. in the day of his trespass

verses.text_plain: And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord, a ram without blemish out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a trespass offering, unto the priest:
verses.verse_html: 6And he shall bring his trespass offering unto the Lord, a ram without blemish out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a trespass offering, unto the priest:

verses.text_plain: And the priest shall make an atonement for him before the Lord: and it shall be forgiven him for any thing of all that he hath done in trespassing therein.
verses.verse_html: 7And the priest shall make an atonement for him before the Lord: and it shall be forgiven him for any thing of all that he hath done in trespassing therein.

tokens.text: of all that he hath done

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 8And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Command Aaron and his sons, saying, This is the law of the burnt offering: It is the burnt offering, because of the burning upon the altar all night unto the morning, and the fire of the altar shall be burning in it.
verses.verse_html:
9Command Aaron and his sons, saying, This is the law of the burnt offering: It is the burnt offering, because of the burning upon the altar all night unto the morning, and the fire of the altar shall be burning in it. ▼
▼ because…: or, for the burning

footnotes.body_html: ▼ because…: or, for the burning

verses.text_plain: And the priest shall put on his linen garment, and his linen breeches shall he put upon his flesh, and take up the ashes which the fire hath consumed with the burnt offering on the altar, and he shall put them beside the altar.
verses.verse_html: 10And the priest shall put on his linen garment, and his linen breeches shall he put upon his flesh, and take up the ashes which the fire hath consumed with the burnt offering on the altar, and he shall put them beside the altar.

verses.text_plain: And he shall put off his garments, and put on other garments, and carry forth the ashes without the camp unto a clean place.
verses.verse_html: 11And he shall put off his garments, and put on other garments, and carry forth the ashes without the camp unto a clean place.

verses.text_plain: And the fire upon the altar shall be burning in it; it shall not be put out: and the priest shall burn wood on it every morning, and lay the burnt offering in order upon it; and he shall burn thereon the fat of the peace offerings.
verses.verse_html: 12And the fire upon the altar shall be burning in it; it shall not be put out: and the priest shall burn wood on it every morning, and lay the burnt offering in order upon it; and he shall burn thereon the fat of the peace offerings.

tokens.text: in it; it shall not be put out
upon it; and he shall burn

verses.text_plain: The fire shall ever be burning upon the altar; it shall never go out.
verses.verse_html: 13The fire shall ever be burning upon the altar; it shall never go out.

verses.text_plain: And this is the law of the meat offering: the sons of Aaron shall offer it before the Lord, before the altar.
verses.verse_html: 14And this is the law of the meat offering: the sons of Aaron shall offer it before the Lord, before the altar.

verses.text_plain: And he shall take of it his handful, of the flour of the meat offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meat offering, and shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour, even the memorial of it, unto the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15And he shall take of it his handful, of the flour of the meat offering, and of the oil thereof, and all the frankincense which is upon the meat offering, and shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour, even the memorial of it, unto the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat: with unleavened bread shall it be eaten in the holy place; in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation they shall eat it.
verses.verse_html: 16And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat: with unleavened bread shall it be eaten in the holy place; in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation they shall eat it.

verses.text_plain: It shall not be baken with leaven. I have given it unto them for their portion of my offerings made by fire; it is most holy, as is the sin offering, and as the trespass offering.
verses.verse_html: 17It shall not be baken with leaven. I have given it unto them for their portion of my offerings made by fire; it is most holy, as is the sin offering, and as the trespass offering.

tokens.text: of my offerings made by fire

verses.text_plain: All the males among the children of Aaron shall eat of it. It shall be a statute for ever in your generations concerning the offerings of the Lord made by fire: every one that toucheth them shall be holy.
verses.verse_html: 18All the males among the children of Aaron shall eat of it. It shall be a statute for ever in your generations concerning the offerings of the Lord made by fire: every one that toucheth them shall be holy.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 19And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: This is the offering of Aaron and of his sons, which they shall offer unto the Lord in the day when he is anointed; the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meat offering perpetual, half of it in the morning, and half thereof at night.
verses.verse_html: 20This is the offering of Aaron and of his sons, which they shall offer unto the Lord in the day when he is anointed; the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meat offering perpetual, half of it in the morning, and half thereof at night.

verses.text_plain: In a pan it shall be made with oil; and when it is baken, thou shalt bring it in: and the baken pieces of the meat offering shalt thou offer for a sweet savour unto the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 21In a pan it shall be made with oil; and when it is baken, thou shalt bring it in: and the baken pieces of the meat offering shalt thou offer for a sweet savour unto the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And the priest of his sons that is anointed in his stead shall offer it: it is a statute for ever unto the Lord; it shall be wholly burnt.
verses.verse_html: 22And the priest of his sons that is anointed in his stead shall offer it: it is a statute for ever unto the Lord; it shall be wholly burnt.

verses.text_plain: For every meat offering for the priest shall be wholly burnt: it shall not be eaten.
verses.verse_html: 23For every meat offering for the priest shall be wholly burnt: it shall not be eaten.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 24And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, saying, This is the law of the sin offering: In the place where the burnt offering is killed shall the sin offering be killed before the Lord: it is most holy.
verses.verse_html: 25Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, saying, This is the law of the sin offering: In the place where the burnt offering is killed shall the sin offering be killed before the Lord: it is most holy.

verses.text_plain: The priest that offereth it for sin shall eat it: in the holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.verse_html: 26The priest that offereth it for sin shall eat it: in the holy place shall it be eaten, in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.text_plain: Whatsoever shall touch the flesh thereof shall be holy: and when there is sprinkled of the blood thereof upon any garment, thou shalt wash that whereon it was sprinkled in the holy place.
verses.verse_html: 27Whatsoever shall touch the flesh thereof shall be holy: and when there is sprinkled of the blood thereof upon any garment, thou shalt wash that whereon it was sprinkled in the holy place.

verses.text_plain: But the earthen vessel wherein it is sodden shall be broken: and if it be sodden in a brasen pot, it shall be both scoured, and rinsed in water.
verses.verse_html: 28But the earthen vessel wherein it is sodden shall be broken: and if it be sodden in a brasen pot, it shall be both scoured, and rinsed in water.

verses.text_plain: All the males among the priests shall eat thereof: it is most holy.
verses.verse_html: 29All the males among the priests shall eat thereof: it is most holy.

verses.text_plain: And no sin offering, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tabernacle of the congregation to reconcile withal in the holy place, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt in the fire.
verses.verse_html: 30And no sin offering, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tabernacle of the congregation to reconcile withal in the holy place, shall be eaten: it shall be burnt in the fire.
